definition: "piece of wood" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 90), mirror image of 片[pian4]
classifier for strips of land or bamboo, shops, factories etc/slit bamboo or chopped wood (dialect)
dagger-axe/abbr. for 戈瑞[ge1 rui4]/(Tw) abbr. for 戈雷[ge1 lei2]

sentences.english: Consequently, Kirilov must kill himself out of love for humanity.
sentences.chinese: 因此出於對人性的愛，基裏洛夫必須自戕。

sentences.english: Kirilov's pistol shot will be the signal for the last revolution.
sentences.chinese: 基裏洛夫自戕的槍聲將是這最後革命的信號。

sentences.english: This bra hooks in the front.
sentences.chinese: 呃件胸罩的戕扣在前面。

definition: many things arranged together, or connected together/to go on limitlessly
branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people, founders of Wei 北魏 of the Northern Dynasties (386-534)/also written 拓跋
to peel with a knife/old variant of 戮[lu4]
to ramble/to rove/old variant of 熬[ao2]
Chi You, legendary creator of metalworking and weapons/comet
